title: Woobly/Shakey image stabilisation not repaired by google repairs
content:
Got a Pixel 4a in November 2020 in Spain.

Just recently (April 2021), the camera started acting weird, the videos are super shaky and the images distorted.

Proof of the fail:

https://photos.app.goo.gl/25auFo9gd3B3LRvt7

Send it for repair to https://store.google.com/es/repair .

Received the device as it was, because "no error was found":




But the device was returned back in the same state as it was.


What am I supposed to do?
